teams.name: KivaKY1230
teams.whereabouts: State of Kentucky (or In Honor Of...)
teams.loan_because: we want to raise our reputation for "southern hospitality" to a tangible level by making a positive difference in our global neighbors' lives.
teams.description: Ordinary people from a very special state, located in the heart of the eastern half of the US, who want to  give a "hand up" to our neighbors  around the world.
